long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FontScaler is a user-friendly Chrome extension designed to provide you with quick and easy control over the zoom level and font size of your browser content. Whether you're straining to read small text or needing to zoom out for a broader view, FontScaler puts the control at your fingertips. With an intuitive slider interface, you can adjust the zoom level and font size instantly on any webpage. A handy reset feature also allows you to restore the original settings with a single click. Make your browsing experience more comfortable and tailored to your needs with FontScaler.
